text:
23
NAEB RADIO NETWORK
PROGRAM OFFERING PROGRAM OFFERING
Title: CHILD DEVELOPMENT
Type: Informal Talk
Time: 30:00
No.: 13 programs to finish series
Origin: WILL
Audience: Adult
Serial Number: 56-39
Release Date: January 6, 1957
This is a series of informal discussions on the child during his pre-school years.
The speaker, Irving Lazar, is a professor of psychology specializing in child
development at the University of Illinois.
The thirteen programs offered this quarter will conclude the series.
